data.title: WNYC; New Sounds; Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
data.meta_description:
For this New Sounds, there's new music from Gaudi & Nusrat Fateh Ali
Khan. Near the 10th anniversary of the death of the great Pakistani singer,
Anglo-Italian producer Gaudi takes early vocal tracks by Nusrat and marries
them to contemporary dance beats not too far removed from the traditional
dance beats of Pakistani qawwali music. Also, Nusrat's collaborations with
Michael Brook, Eddie Vedder, and Peter Gabriel. Plus, music from the Nusrat
Fateh Ali Khan Qawwali Party itself. PROGRAM #2700 Remembering Nusrat (First
aired on Thursday, 7/12/07) ARTIST(S) RECORDING CUT(S) SOURCE Peter Gabriel

data.text:
Description

For this New Sounds, there's new music from Gaudi & Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan. Near the 10th anniversary of the death of the great Pakistani singer, Anglo-Italian producer Gaudi takes early vocal tracks by Nusrat and marries them to contemporary dance beats not too far removed from the traditional dance beats of Pakistani qawwali music. Also, Nusrat's collaborations with Michael Brook, Eddie Vedder, and Peter Gabriel. Plus, music from the Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Qawwali Party itself. PROGRAM #2700 Remembering Nusrat (First aired on Thursday, 7/12/07) ARTIST(S) RECORDING CUT(S) SOURCE Peter Gabriel Passion Passion [7:00] Geffen #24206 ** Available at Amazon.com* Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan & Michael Brook Night Song Longing [5:30] Real World #562354 www.realworldrecords.com Gaudi & Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Dub Qawwali Mainoo ole Bai [5:00] Six Degrees #1137** www.sixdegrees records.com* Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Greatest Hits, Vol. 2 Gali De Wichon Kaun [9:30] Shanachie #66008 www.shanachie.com Various Artists: Eddie Vedder & Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Dead Man Walking soundtrack The Face of Love [5:30] Sony #67522 Available at Amazon.com* Various Artists: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan & Coro Novum Gaudium Invocation Popule Meus Quid Feci Tibi? [7:00] Six Degrees #314 524 441 www.sixdegrees records.com* Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Peace Loves Light [4:00] Omniparc #6001 Out of print.
